description: Try our easy to follow Peanut, Squid & Noodle Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Peanut, Squid & Noodle Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the green beans to the pan and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Stir in the fish sauce, sugar, lemon juice and measurement water and cook for a further minute. Remove the pan from the heat, add the drained noodles and toss together. Add the peanuts, squid and extra coriander leaves and toss again. Serve warm or cool with lime wedges, if liked.

Remove the pan from the heat, add the drained noodles and toss together. Add the peanuts, squid and extra coriander leaves and toss again. Serve warm or cool with lime wedges, if liked.
